BaseTemplate.description: A modern content management platform built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_description: A powerful yet simple platform to create, manage, and share your content. Write in Markdown, publish instantly.
Index.hero_description: A powerful yet simple platform to create, manage, and share your content. Write in Markdown, publish instantly, and reach your audience.
Index.features_subtitle: Powerful features to help you create and share amazing content
Index.feature_editor_desc: Write in Markdown with live preview. Format your content beautifully with ease.
Index.feature_secure_desc: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and authentication.
Index.feature_fast_desc: Built with Next.js 15 for optimal performance and instant page loads.
Index.feature_search_desc: Find any post instantly with powerful search and filtering capabilities.
Index.feature_media_desc: Embed images, videos, and code snippets seamlessly in your posts.
Index.feature_control_desc: Manage drafts, publish, edit, and delete posts with complete control.
Index.cta_subtitle: Join our community and share your stories with the world. It's free and takes less than a minute.
Index.footer_write_desc: Express yourself with our intuitive Markdown editor
Index.footer_publish_desc: Share your content with the world in seconds
Index.footer_track_desc: Manage all your posts from a beautiful dashboard

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Dashboard.alternative_message: Want to build your SaaS faster using the same stack? Try <url></url>.

Posts.title: Discover Posts
Posts.subtitle: Explore articles and stories from our community
Posts.no_posts_search: Try adjusting your search terms or browse all posts.
Posts.no_posts_create: Be the first to share your thoughts and create a post!

MyDashboard.title: My Posts
MyDashboard.subtitle: Manage and organize your blog posts
MyDashboard.no_posts_yet: You haven't created any posts yet.
MyDashboard.no_posts_page: No posts found on this page.
MyDashboard.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post?

PostDetail.no_permission: Post not found or you do not have permission to view it
PostDetail.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post?

NewPost.content_placeholder: Write your post content here... (Markdown supported)
NewPost.preview_empty: No content to preview. Start writing in the Edit tab.

EditPost.content_placeholder: Write your post content here... (Markdown supported)
EditPost.preview_empty: No content to preview. Start writing in the Edit tab.
EditPost.error_no_permission: You do not have permission to edit this post

Auth.error_password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
Auth.email_confirm_notice: You'll need to confirm your email address before you can sign in
Auth.check_email_message: We've sent a confirmation email to

Footer.about_desc: A minimalist CMS for sharing your thoughts and ideas with the world.
